name: D2 Diagram Generator
description: Generate D2 diagram files (.d2) for technical reference â€” flowcharts, architecture diagrams, sequence diagrams, state machines, database schemas, and class diagrams.
author: EnhanceClaude
customInstructions: Requires D2 CLI installed (https://d2lang.com) and VS Code D2 extension for preview.

name: Draw.io Diagram Generator
description: Generate and edit draw.io diagrams (.drawio XML). Use for flowcharts, architecture diagrams, swimlane diagrams in .drawio format.
author: EnhanceClaude
customInstructions: Requires VS Code draw.io extension for preview.

name: Fine-Grained Skill Builder
description: Guide for building fine-grained Claude Code skills where content is split into many small files to minimize tokens loaded per invocation.
author: EnhanceClaude

name: Mermaid Diagramming
description: Create, edit, and layout Mermaid diagrams (.mmd files) correctly in VS Code. Covers node shapes, edge types, line breaks in labels, subgraph layout rules, and VS Code preview commands.
author: EnhanceClaude
customInstructions: Requires VS Code MermaidChart extension for preview.

name: PDF to Text
description: Convert PDF files to clean text. Handles both embedded-text PDFs and scanned/image PDFs via OCR.
author: EnhanceClaude
customInstructions: Requires pdftotext (poppler-utils), and optionally tesseract-ocr and ocrmypdf for scanned PDFs. Install: sudo apt install poppler-utils tesseract-ocr (Linux) or brew install poppler tesseract (macOS).

name: RTF Creator
description: Generate valid RTF (Rich Text Format) documents from scratch. Produces formatted documents compatible with Word, LibreOffice, and other word processors.
author: EnhanceClaude
customInstructions: Optional: pip install rtfparse for validation.

name: Shared Tmux Terminal
description: Open a shared tmux terminal window that both Claude and the user can see and control simultaneously. Claude sends commands and reads output autonomously.
author: EnhanceClaude
customInstructions: Requires tmux installed. Linux also needs a terminal emulator (gnome-terminal, konsole, etc.) and optionally xdotool for window title control.

name: SOLID Developer
description: Professional development agent enforcing SOLID principles, strict naming conventions, literal interpretation, scope discipline, and honest error acknowledgment.
author: EnhanceClaude

name: SOLID Vue Development
description: Core principles for writing clean, disciplined Vue 3 apps. Covers state vs behavior separation, component boundaries, manager pattern, reactive chains, and naming conventions.
author: EnhanceClaude

name: Test-Driven Development
description: Enforce strict Test-Driven Development workflow: write one test, make it pass, verify, then proceed. Prevents over-implementation and ensures code matches requirements exactly.
author: EnhanceClaude

name: Typographic Hierarchy
description: Format documentation, READMEs, and structured text using header hierarchy where each level stands alone. Makes content scannable at multiple reading depths.
author: EnhanceClaude

name: VS Code Agent Teams
description: Workaround for agent teams in VS Code extension where TeamCreate teammates cannot execute tools. Uses an echo-back-and-resume pattern.
author: EnhanceClaude
customInstructions: Only needed when using Claude Code via the VS Code extension. Not needed for CLI usage.
